isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - Meritor Transfer Cases MTC-4208, -4210, and -4213 - Assembly - Front Axle Shifter Assembly

step1.para: Rotate the transfer case to install the front axle shift cylinder.
Remove the front axle shift cylinder used to temporarily hold the shift shaft in place.
Grease the O-ring on the piston and install the piston into the cylinder.
Apply a 1/8-inch (3 mm) bead of Loctite® 277 sealant to the first three threads of the shift cylinder.
Install and tighten the shift cylinder to 85-95 lb-ft (115-129 Nm).
Install the front output shaft oil seal using oil seal driver R4422402 (Meritor Kit No. 4454). Drive the seal until it is fully seated (Figure 56).
Install the front output shaft yoke, washer and yoke nut. Tighten the yoke nut to 700-900 lb-ft (949-1220 Nm).
